Action.author: gennadyl
Action.body: I think one extra parameter to this call (how many stack trace to skip) will work perfect.

Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: I think that alternatively there could be another method with the parameter so that it won't effect other consumers of this package that have already began incorporating the err handling framework into their code.

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: CR submitted to gerrit for review:Â https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/11983/

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Marking this Done as we've switched to a new error handling framework (https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-5504).
